source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Get Creative with Clay!

visible_instructors.name: Anne Goodrich
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Teacher, Owner of Tumalo Art Farm
visible_instructors.title: Anne Goodrich Hunter

items.headline: This course will explore different ways to develop meaning and generate artistic ideas as applied to clay.
objectives_summary: In this course we will experiment with creative thinking and apply that to our pottery and ceramic art-making.  I'll give you both technical and conceptual guidance and lead you through some really fun projects.

items.title: How to Start Your Own Hairbow Business
items.headline: Learn how to start your home based hair bow business for fun and profit.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to start your own home based hair bow business.

items.title: Beadwork GutsyGuide: Adjustable Beaded Bra Straps

visible_instructors.name: Heather
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Designer and Owner at GutsyGirl Designs
visible_instructors.title: Heather Rivera, M.Ed.

items.headline: Create Fabulous and Functional Jewelry Quality Beaded Bra Straps You'll Want to Show Off
objectives_summary: Demonstrate proficiency in making single color straps
Convert standard straps into large size straps
Craft multiple color strap patterns, including ladder, swerve, color block, ombre and rainbow

items.title: 書道LEVEL4:Mindful Japanese Calligraphy for Beginners13-17/30
items.headline: SHODO by Nohoh-Method: The Complete KAISHO Style! 30 Basic Srokes & 100 KANJIs. WITHOUT Japanese Knowledge!
objectives_summary: Be able to manage five basic strokes of Japanese calligraphy in Kaisho style
Learn the basic knowledge of the Japanese Calligraphy SHODO
Learn 17 Ideographs (KANJIs)

items.title: How To Teach Drama To Kids
items.headline: Your Step By Step Guide To Teaching Drama To Kids
objectives_summary: How To Teach Drama To Kids

items.title: Graphite Pencil Drawing for the Advanced Beginner
items.headline: Drawing and Texturing a Beautiful Dog Portrait
objectives_summary: Recreate a photo of a dog using graphite pencil.
Learn and use measuring techniques for scaling up in size and ensuring drawing accuracy.
Create animal textures and values with graphite pencils.

items.title: Paint this watercolor painting in 8 easy steps. Just COPY ME

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Paint this watercolor and learn to plan, identify problem areas, paint wet & loose & create details with confidence.
objectives_summary: Understand the benefits of a sound planning process to paint a landscape.
Understand the concept of 'artist's license' and the flexibility it can afford you.
Be able to confidently achieve variety in colours with a limited palette.

items.title: Learn To Make An Amazing Landscape through oil painting
items.headline: Learn how to paint breath taking landscapes.
objectives_summary: Be fluent in oil painting
Ability to create variable strokes
Ability to draw and paint Mountains, Trees, Rocks and other natural entities in oil paint

items.title: How to Draw Animals, Landscapes and Portraits in Pastel
items.headline: Follow Colin's Step by Step lessons, learn to draw pictures you never thought possible and get AMAZING results.
objectives_summary: How to Draw an Animal, Landscape and Portrait using Pastel Pencils
The light to dark rule when layering pastel colours
How to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: How To Draw Anime/Manga Anatomy For Beginners - Girl Edition
items.headline: Learn Anime / Manga anatomy QUICKLY with this 30 minute crash course!
objectives_summary: Female Edition

items.title: Travel Sketching With Oil Pastel
items.headline: Take your time to be fully present at the moment you enjoy, to truly observe a place in order to sketch it.
objectives_summary: capture and filter your impression, mood, and atmosphere of the place
create architecture, landscape, cityscape and street sketches
how to choose medium & sketchbook for traveling

items.title: Easy coffee painting
items.headline: Make unique paintings with coffee
objectives_summary: Cutting paper and preparing the painting surface
Using brushes in various ways
Mixing coffee in different shades

items.title: 'Must Try' Watercolour Techniques
items.headline: These techniques of unusual effects make up a watercolour artist toolbox!
objectives_summary: The best way to understand the medium of watercolours is to experiment with a variety of techniques which make up a watercolour artist toolbox.
Take some time to practice these washes, scratching out, resist techniques and manipulations, described in “Must Try” Watercolour techniques.
Explore and experiment!

items.title: Mastering Glazing Techniques in Watercolor , Level II
items.headline: A step by step demonstration of the watercolor glazing technique executed in real time.
objectives_summary: Apply the content of the demonstration to their own painting challenges with watercolor glazing techniques.While every painting poses its own challenges, students will see a practical application of color usage in a sequence that is more likely to create vibrant glowing washes.s .
Successful students will have a broader knowledge of watercolor glazing techniques.

items.title: Drawing Cute Animals Characters Step by Step
items.headline: Discover How to Build Character Designs Step by Step in Easy and Fun way
objectives_summary: Building their creativity, confidence, and soft skill
Get the basic skill about character designs
Draw animals in easy ways based on basic shapes

items.title: Watercolour Bird Painting - How To Paint a Realistic Wren
items.headline: Learn to paint wildlife in watercolour by adding detail to give a feeling of realism to a painting
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this Wren while you are guided step by step through a range of watercolour techniques.
This video takes you through the whole process of painting this lovely classic Wren using fine detailed watercolour techniques.
Learn how to paint feathers
